vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Κρήσκης, -εντος (BI., § 10, 4), ὁ
Crescens: 2Ti.4:10.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 2Ti.4.10
§ Crescens, "increasing"
Crescens, a Latin (Proper name), 2Tim. 4:10*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
革勒士 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "生長"
保羅的助手, 據說是七十個們徒之一 (提後 4:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
革勒士 这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 "生长"
保罗的助手, 据说是七十个们徒之一 (提后 4:10)
